text: On uzakonil dlya vas v religii to, chto zaveshchal Nukhu, chto otkryli My tebe i chto zaveshchali Ibrakhimu, i Muse, i Ise: "Derzhite pryamo veru i ne razdelyaytes' v ney!" Veliko dlya mnogobozhnikov to, k chemu ty prizyvayesh'! Allakh izbirayet k Sebe, kogo pozhelayet, i vedet k Sebe, kto obrashchayetsya
